entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING, Inukjuak
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:06 p.m. EDT Monday 17 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow and blowing snow. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow and blowing snow beginning early this evening. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 60 increasing to 50 gusting to 80 near midnight. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 16 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Monday 17 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Blizzard. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Blizzard. Wind northeast 60 km/h gusting to 80. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 21 in the morning and minus 16 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Monday 17 April 2023
